about_the_game:
Step into the world of Kingdom of Piss, a wild, punk-infused visual novel that blends irreverence, adventure, and bizarre humor. Meet our rebellious heroes—two gay royal heirs who’d rather be crowd-surfing at a concert than ruling a kingdom. These two misfits are stuck in a situation they never asked for, as they navigate the chaos of royal life while craving freedom.

In this hilarious, over-the-top visual novel inspired by TROMA films and Rocky Horror, join Pretty Piss Princess and Asian American as they confront the absurdity of their privileged positions and escape into their punk-rock fantasy. With no shortage of wild adventures, dark humor, and heart, they’ll face impossible choices and laugh in the face of tradition. Whether it’s battling absurd political schemes, sabotaging stuffy royal events, or just blowing off steam at a local dive bar, this couple is out to prove that sometimes the best way to rule is by refusing to follow the rules.

Prepare for offbeat humor, vibrant characters, and a whole lot of ridiculous fun as you experience this rebellious journey. Will they dodge the crown and create their own future, or will destiny force them to wear it? Get ready for a rollicking ride where being royal doesn’t mean playing by anyone’s rules!

content_descriptors.notes: Mild Sexual Content, Depiction of Suicide, Cartoon Violence, Use of Alcohol

name: Kingdom of Piss

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10.
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Join two punk-rock royal heirs, Pretty Piss Princess and Asian American, as they dodge their royal duties in favor of adventures. This hilarious visual novel, inspired by TROMA films, follows the duo as they navigate the absurdities of royal life, and embrace their rebellious spirit.
